text: unkal iraivanin mannippirkum cuvarkkattirkum ninkal muntunkal, accuvarkkattin parappu, vanattinutaiyavum, pumiyinutaiyavum parappaip ponratakum, evarkal allahvin mitum, avan tutar mitum iman kolkirarkalo, avarkalukku atu cittam ceytu vaikkappattirukkiratu. Atu allahvutaiya kirupaiyakum - atanai avan natiyavarukku alikkinran. Innum, allah makattana kirupaiyutaiyavan
